projects.title: Circular Buildings: A Case Study of Sustainable Vacation Homes at Camping de Paardekreek in Kortgene
projects.description:
Together with my Team I have been working on a circular vacation home project to examine the critical raw materials and life cycle assessment of vacation homes in Kortgene (The Netherlands). Furthermore, we did a practical study to find a sustainable replacement for concrete. 

During this project I have learned:
* Project Management and marketing
* Academic skills, tests methods, research report writing
* Engineer Skills
* Sustainable materials
* Life cycle assessment 
* Critical raw materials 
* Finding out of the box solutions for obstacles

___________________

Samen met mijn Team hebben we aan een circulaire vakantie huizen project gewerkt om meer te leren over kritieke grondstoffen en een levenscyclus beoordeling te maken voor vakantie huizen in Kortgene (Nederland). Hiernaast hebben we een praktijkonderzoek gedaan om een duurzame vervanging voor beton te vinden.

Tijdens dit project heb ik geleerd:
* Project Management en marketing 
* Academische vaardigheden, test methodes, onderzoeksrapport schrijven
* Ingenieur vaardigheden
* Duurzame materialen
* Kritische grondstoffen
* levenscyclus beoordeling 
* Creatief omgaan met obstakels

projects.title: Bio Based Materials: Alternative to Plastic
projects.description:

During this project I have learned:
* Project Management
* Academic skills, tests methods, research report writing

___________________

Samen met mijn Team hebben we aan een Bio-Based materialen project gewerkt om een alternatief voor plastic verpakkingen te vinden.

* Project Management

projects.title: Dare to Repair
projects.description:
Tijdens de cursus 'True Replicas' heb ik een stoplap onderzocht. Mijn project heb ik gedocumenteerd in een logbook op Notion. Tijdens dit project heb ik mezelf aangeleerd om kleding te repareren. Deze kennis heb ik gebundeld in een reparatie gids genaamd 'Dare to Repair'. Hiernaast heb ik een expositie ingericht met gerepareerde kleding als inspiratie, een DIY kleding reparatie werkplek en de reparatie gids.

Mijn reparatie gids is gratis raad te plegen op de Eleanor Green Office website: https://eleanorgreenoffice.org/student-papers/clothing-repair-guide

_______________

I have researched a ’stoplap’ in the course ‘True Replicas’. This project is documented in a logbook on Notion. I have taught myself to repair clothing during this project. This knowledge was used to create ‘Dare to Repair’ a clothing repair guide. Furthermore, I have created an exposition with a DIY repair workspace, repaired clothing as an inspiration and the repair guide.

The repair guide is published (for free) on the Eleanor Green Office website: https://eleanorgreenoffice.org/student-papers/clothing-repair-guide

profile_positions.description:
Provinciale statenlid PvdA-Groenlinks in Zeeland.
Commissies: Ruimte en Strategische Opgaven
profile_positions.title: Provincial Council member

profile_positions.description:
“Green Office Utrecht University (GOUU) is the platform for students and employees of Utrecht University where sustainable ideas are formed, plans come together and projects are launched. GOUU supports Utrecht University's sustainability process. We raise awareness about sustainable solutions and UU ambitions among students and staff and support sustainability projects from within our university community.” (quote: GOUU website)

At the GOUU, I develop projects, activities and campaigns to raise awareness amongst the UU community about sustainable topics. 
The campaign about biodiversity has ended in March 2023. Currently, we are working on a Zero Waste campaign. 

* Organise sustainability campaigns and events that raise awareness and involvement among the UU community
* Create budget proposals 
* Teamwork with other GOUU members 
* Involve the Green Teams and volunteers
profile_positions.title: Project & campaign coördinator

profile_positions.description: 5e op de lijst van PvdA GroenLinks voor provinciale staten verkiezingen in Zeeland.
profile_positions.title: Kandidaat Provinciale staten Zeeland

profile_positions.description:
I was second on the list as a candidate for the political party GreenLeft in the municipality of Terneuzen.

* Presentation at the Meet-up Air quality
* Two interviews on GO-RTV
* Campaign
* Advice on sustainability and a healthy (living) environment
profile_positions.title: Candidate municipality elections Terneuzen

profile_positions.description:
I am SDG Voice at SDG Netherlands and give presentations, advice and workshops throughout the Netherlands about the Sustainable Development Goals and the implications of these goals.

Projects: Spatial Design Students, Municipalities4GlobalGoals, Netherlands makes Impact Academy, SDG actions days, SDG Jury member
profile_positions.title: SDG Voice

profile_positions.description: I was elected to represent the students of the Faculty Geoscience of Utrecht University in the Faculty Council of 2022-2023. Next to my work as a councilwoman, I am working on the committees' Sustainability, Career services, Masters, and Equality, Diversity and Inclusion.
profile_positions.title: Faculty Council Geosciences

profile_positions.description:
I worked together with professors and students in the Green Team Geo working group to make the Geoscience faculty more sustainable.

* Putting sustainability on the map in the faculty.
* Looking for solutions and initiating projects.
profile_positions.title: Green Team Faculty Geoscience

profile_positions.description:
I'm a photographer at photoshoots and I create fine art photographs on the road. 

* I focus mostly on travel, culture, industries, nature, and environmental photography. 
* During photo workshops, I assist participants with camera settings, composition, and general tips and tricks to improve the quality of their photography.
* I also work as a model.

Examples of work:
* Lodewijk College: Photo reportage graduation 2020 and 2021
* Toonbeeld and VVV Hulst: Hosting photo workshops 2018-present
profile_positions.title: Photographer, Workshop Assistent and Fashion Model

profile_positions.description:
Through Fair Future Generators I found an internship at the Guerrilla Gardeners Foundation. Guerrilla Gardeners want to bring greenery back to the city by planting tree mirrors (boomspiegels), creating façade gardens, giving workshops, setting up campaigns and organizing events. 

* Organizing and planning events 
    * National ''Boomspiegel' Festival and media event 
* Trouw Duurzame 100 
* Communication, lobbying, involving and bringing people together 
* Setting up a digital 'Happy Bees Paradise' children's campaign 
* Advice on sustainable building materials and office design 
* Climate adaptation 
* Gained knowledge about biodiversity and DIY Guerrilla gardens

https://guerrillagardeners.nl
profile_positions.title: Intern Foundation Guerrilla Gardeners Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
Via Fair Future Generators (FFG) heb ik samen met andere jongeren heb ik de kans de wereld (en mezelf) een stukje beter te maken. Tijdens twee trainingweekenden en vele inspiratie bijeenkomsten heb ik veel geleerd. Hiernaast heb ik via FFG een stage gelopen bij Stichting Guerrillia Gardeners.

* Maatschappelijke werkervaring klimaatproject
* Workshops over klimaatrechtvaardigheid, duurzaamheid, inclusiviteit, organizeren, campagne voeren, lobbyen, projectplanning, JMA, et cetera. 
* Project management
* Netwerken, communicatie en teamwork
profile_positions.title: Fair future generators

volunteer_experiences.role: Werkgroep Jong GroenLinks Zeeland en Linkse Zeeuwen
volunteer_experiences.description: Samen met een klein team werken we samen aan projecten en evenementen voor jongeren die geïnteresseerd zijn in linkse politiek. Samen hebben we activiteiten georganiseerd zoals clean ups, thema avonden, borrels en gastlessen

I was  a buddy on the Unibuddy messaging platform at the University College Roosevelt. 

In this function, I answer pressing questions about UCR, Liberal Arts and Sciences education, student life, Middelburg, and any other question prospective students have. 

Unibuddy creates a bond between current UCR students and our prospective students at different stages in the admissions process. 

The prospective students can contact me through the UCR website, social media, and through the Unibuddy app. Furthermore, prospective students can chat with me during one of the bi-weekly live events and open days.

https://www.ucr.nl/about-ucr/discover/talk-to-our-students/

I am a member of the Young Climate Panel of the Young Climate Movement (Jonge Klimaatpanel). 
* I share my ideas and hope to impact the climate plans of the Netherlands. 
* These plans influence, for example, the way of living, traveling, and eating. 
With this participation, I hope to contribute to a more sustainable and inclusive future.
_______________

Ik ben lid van de Jonge Klimaatpanel van de Jonge klimaatbeweging. 
* Ik mijn stem horen met die een impact hebben op de klimaatplannen van Nederland. 
* Deze plannen hebben invloed op de manier van reizen, eten, wonen. 
Hiermee hoop ik een steentje bij te dragen aan een duurzamere en inclusievere toekomst.

Ik ben vrijwilliger bij Milieudefensie en help met het organiseren en realiseren van klimaat acties.
* Klimaat Alarm (14-03-2021) - Organisator, vrijwilliger en persvoorlichter
* Figurant in video crowdfund actie (29-04-2021)
* "Van Vervuilder tot Formatie" 2021 - Organisator, vrijwilliger en persvoorlichter (Radio, website en tv)
________
I am a volunteer for Milieudefensie and help with the organisation, realisation and marketing of climate actions.
* Klimaat Alarm (14-03-2021) - Organizer, volunteer and press officer
* Extra in video crowdfund action (29-04-2021)
* "from polluter to formation" 2021 - Organizer, volunteer and press officer (Radio, website and tv)

I have been doing several voluntary activities and taking online courses at the Greenpeace Academy

Ik heb meerdere verschillende vrijwilligers activiteiten bij Greenpeace gedaan. Hiernaast heb ik ook cursussen gedaan bij de Greenpeace Academy

Teamleader for the Green Garden volunteers at the Refugee center in Middelburg. Volunteers are either the residents from the refugee center and students from the University College Roosevelt.

* Teamleader refugee and student volunteers 
* Communication between volunteers and Refugee center
* Planning and maintenance of the Green Garden
* Interview on Omroep Zeeland
